Description: Bacterial disease caused by Xanthomonas campestris pv. vesicatoria. Causes water-soaked spots on leaves, fruits, and stems that become necrotic.
Symptoms: Small, water-soaked spots on leaves that enlarge and turn brown; raised spots on fruits; leaf yellowing and drop
Organic_Remedy: Copper-based sprays, neem oil, garlic extract, biocontrol with Bacillus subtilis
Prevention: Use disease-free seeds, crop rotation, avoid overhead irrigation, field sanitation

Description: Healthy pepper plants with no disease symptoms.
Symptoms: Vigorous growth, green leaves, normal fruit development
Organic_Remedy: Maintain soil health with compost, regular monitoring
Prevention: Continue good agricultural practices, regular inspection

Description: Fungal disease caused by Alternaria solani. Characterized by target-like concentric rings on leaves.
Symptoms: Dark brown spots with concentric rings on older leaves, yellow halos, defoliation
Organic_Remedy: Neem oil spray, Trichoderma application, compost tea
Prevention: Use certified seeds, proper spacing, balanced fertilization, remove infected leaves

Description: Devastating fungal disease caused by Phytophthora infestans. Spreads rapidly in cool, wet conditions.
Symptoms: Water-soaked lesions on leaves, white fungal growth underside, rapid plant collapse
Organic_Remedy: Copper-based fungicides, baking soda spray, proper drainage
Prevention: Use resistant varieties, avoid waterlogging, destroy infected plants, crop rotation

Description: Healthy potato plants with normal growth and development.
Symptoms: Healthy foliage, proper tuber formation, no disease signs
Prevention: Maintain soil health, proper irrigation, weed control

Description: Bacterial disease caused by Xanthomonas species. Affects leaves, stems, and fruits.
Symptoms: Small, dark, water-soaked spots with yellow halos, leaf curling, fruit lesions
Organic_Remedy: Copper sprays, neem oil, biocontrol agents
Prevention: Use treated seeds, avoid working with wet plants, proper spacing

Description: Fungal disease caused by Alternaria solani. Common in tomato cultivation worldwide.
Symptoms: Concentric ring spots on leaves, stem cankers, fruit rot at stem end
Organic_Remedy: Neem oil @ 3%, Trichoderma harzianum, compost tea
Prevention: Crop rotation, resistant varieties, remove lower leaves, proper nutrition

Description: Serious fungal disease caused by Phytophthora infestans. Can destroy entire crop quickly.
Symptoms: Large, water-soaked lesions, white mold growth, rapid wilting, fruit rot
Organic_Remedy: Copper fungicides, potassium bicarbonate, proper ventilation
Prevention: Avoid overhead irrigation, use resistant varieties, early detection

Description: Fungal disease caused by Passalora fulva. Thrives in high humidity conditions.
Symptoms: Yellow spots on upper leaf surface, olive-green mold underside, leaf curling
Organic_Remedy: Baking soda spray, milk solution, proper ventilation
Prevention: Reduce humidity, proper spacing, greenhouse ventilation

Description: Fungal disease caused by Septoria lycopersici. Characterized by numerous small spots.
Symptoms: Small, circular spots with dark borders and gray centers, yellowing, defoliation
Organic_Remedy: Copper spray, sulfur dust, neem oil
Prevention: Crop rotation, remove infected debris, avoid overhead watering

Description: Pest infestation by Tetranychus urticae. Not a disease but included in dataset.
Symptoms: Fine webbing, stippling on leaves, yellowing, reduced plant vigor
Organic_Remedy: Neem oil, insecticidal soap, predatory mites
Prevention: Maintain humidity, avoid water stress, regular monitoring

Description: Fungal disease caused by Corynespora cassiicola. Creates target-like lesions.
Symptoms: Concentric ring spots on leaves and fruits, leaf drop, fruit lesions
Prevention: Proper spacing, avoid overhead irrigation, remove infected leaves

Description: Viral disease transmitted by whiteflies. Causes severe stunting and yield loss.
Symptoms: Upward leaf curling, yellowing, stunted growth, reduced fruit size
Organic_Remedy: Neem oil for whitefly control, reflective mulches
Prevention: Use resistant varieties, whitefly management, remove infected plants
Season: All seasons where whiteflies are active

Description: Viral disease causing mosaic patterns on leaves. Spreads through contact.
Symptoms: Mosaic patterns on leaves, leaf distortion, stunted growth, fruit discoloration
Organic_Remedy: No cure; remove infected plants, disinfect tools
Prevention: Use virus-free seeds, disinfect tools, control weeds, hand washing

Description: Healthy tomato plants with no disease symptoms.
Symptoms: Vigorous growth, dark green leaves, normal flowering and fruiting
Prevention: Continue good agricultural practices, regular monitoring
